it."},{"lineNumber":260476,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":260477,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　かなみを差し出す","translatedEnglishLine":"> Offer Demon."},{"lineNumber":260479,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択　かなみを差し出す直後","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice: Immediately after offering time."},{"lineNumber":260481,"originalJapaneseLine":"使ってくれていいぜ","translatedEnglishLine":"Feel free to use her for that."},{"lineNumber":260482,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみが絶望する・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami despairs..."},{"lineNumber":260483,"originalJapaneseLine":"がはははは、なーんてな、冗談だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha, just kidding."},{"lineNumber":260484,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうそうなんども俺様の女を渡してなるものか","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s no way I’d hand over my woman again and again."},{"lineNumber":260485,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時の恨みはらさせてもらうぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll have my revenge for that time."},{"lineNumber":260486,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択　倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice: Defeat."},{"lineNumber":260487,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時は俺様もまだ若かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Back then, I was still young."},{"lineNumber":260488,"originalJapaneseLine":"今の俺は人類の王、大総統閣下だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, I am the king of humanity, the supreme commander."},{"lineNumber":260489,"originalJapaneseLine":"門番悪魔ごとき敵ではない、ぶっ倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"A mere gatekeeper demon is no enemy; I'll knock it down."},{"lineNumber":260490,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと、門番悪魔ごときって・・あれって６階級悪魔よ","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait, 'mere gatekeeper demon'... that’s a sixth rank demon."},{"lineNumber":260491,"originalJapaneseLine":"けっこう上位なんだよ","translatedEnglishLine":"They're pretty high-ranking."},{"lineNumber":260492,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫、倒せる気がする","translatedEnglishLine":"It's fine, I feel like I can defeat it."},{"lineNumber":260493,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　リターンデーモン","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle: Return Demon."},{"lineNumber":260494,"originalJapaneseLine":"対応に失敗してリターンで飛ばされる","translatedEnglishLine":"Failed to respond properly and got teleported back by Return."},{"lineNumber":260495,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":260496,"originalJapaneseLine":"リターンが発動した。うわっ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Return was activated. Whoa..."},{"lineNumber":260497,"originalJapaneseLine":"気が付くと迷宮の入り口。おのれー　いかって突っ込む","translatedEnglishLine":"When I noticed, I was back at the labyrinth's entrance. Damn it—angrily charging in."},{"lineNumber":260498,"originalJapaneseLine":"またリターンデーモンと戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle again with the Return Demon."},{"lineNumber":260499,"originalJapaneseLine":"再度、リターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Return activated again."},{"lineNumber":260500,"originalJapaneseLine":"迷宮の入り口","translatedEnglishLine":"The labyrinth entrance."},{"lineNumber":260501,"originalJapaneseLine":"がっくり、やる気を失ったランス、なんか今回はやるきなくなった帰る","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, feeling dejected and losing motivation, somehow loses will this time and goes home."},{"lineNumber":260502,"originalJapaneseLine":"とランス城に戻っていった","translatedEnglishLine":"And returned to Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":260503,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞このままクエストアウト　失敗になります","translatedEnglishLine":"> Quest out as is – this will be a failure."},{"lineNumber":260504,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪魔迷宮を進んでいると","translatedEnglishLine":"While progressing through the demon labyrinth,"},{"lineNumber":260505,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance appears."},{"lineNumber":260506,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスとはバベルの塔から突き落とされて以来","translatedEnglishLine":"Ever since he was thrown down from the Tower of Babel by Lance,"},{"lineNumber":260507,"originalJapaneseLine":"　修行の冒険中","translatedEnglishLine":"He has been on a training adventure."},{"lineNumber":260508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスが過去に冒険で立ち寄った場所を全て制覇する","translatedEnglishLine":"He aims to conquer all the places Lance ever visited during his past adventures."},{"lineNumber":260509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そしてお前を超える","translatedEnglishLine":"And then surpass you."},{"lineNumber":260510,"originalJapaneseLine":"てなのを中二病ぽく","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like a chuunibyou (delusional teen syndrome) phrase."},{"lineNumber":260511,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは面白がってちゃかす、ほう、よく俺様がここを通っていた事を知っていたな","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance teases him, amused: 'Oh? You knew well that I used to pass through here.'"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔人レイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon lord Rei

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さきほどのサテラの説明が的確と分かる感じで見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like showing that Satella's earlier explanation was accurate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦だからしかたないとめんどくさそうに戦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fighting reluctantly, thinking 'It's part of the plan, so it can't be helped'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不良、何か欲求不満でイライラしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The delinquent is irritated, somehow frustrated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５千の魔物兵を連れて戦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is fighting with five thousand demon soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮がめんどくさくなったので自分が出る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tired of the hassle of commanding, he goes out himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと意見を言った魔物兵は電撃で黒焦げ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A demon soldier who voiced an opinion was scorched to a black crisp by an electric shock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傍若無人、あばれまくる、魔人なので圧倒的に強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrogant and rampaging wildly, as a demon lord, he is overwhelmingly strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傭兵団のリーダー、セシルが立ちふさがる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mercenary leader, Cecil, stands in his way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、あんた強そうだな、俺と戦え、逃げるなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, you look strong. Fight me and don't run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは部下に撤退命令を出させ、自分がしんがりとして戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil orders his subordinates to retreat and fights as the rearguard himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中の会話、そういや、この側に悪魔の洞窟があったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During movement, a conversation: 'Come to think of it, there was a demon cave nearby.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこなら魔軍にも接触する事なく近道になるだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That would be a shortcut without encountering the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し移動して悪魔の洞窟に入った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They moved a bit and entered the demon cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かもーん、フェリス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, Felis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼び出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calls her out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か会話・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some conversation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスはこの後消えます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis will disappear after this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔と天使に付け狙われているから、あまり出さないでねと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says she is being targeted by demons and angels, so don't summon her too often.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、悪魔の洞窟を進むぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's proceed through the demon cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔洞窟
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リターンデーモンが道を塞ぐ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A Return Demon blocks the path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ０３と同じ展開、かなみが思い出して・・いやがる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The same scenario as '03', Kanami recalls it... and dislikes it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　かなみを差し出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Offer Kanami.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　リターンデーモンを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Defeat the Return Demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択　かなみを差し出す直後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice: Immediately after offering Kanami.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、またかなみを出そう、前と同じようにエロい事に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll send Kanami out again to do something erotic like last time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使ってくれていいぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feel free to use her for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみが絶望する・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami despairs...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、なーんてな、冗談だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, just kidding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうそうなんども俺様の女を渡してなるものか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no way I’d hand over my woman again and again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時の恨みはらさせてもらうぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll have my revenge for that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択　倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice: Defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時は俺様もまだ若かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then, I was still young.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の俺は人類の王、大総統閣下だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, I am the king of humanity, the supreme commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門番悪魔ごとき敵ではない、ぶっ倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mere gatekeeper demon is no enemy; I'll knock it down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと、門番悪魔ごときって・・あれって６階級悪魔よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, 'mere gatekeeper demon'... that’s a sixth rank demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっこう上位なんだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're pretty high-ranking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、倒せる気がする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine, I feel like I can defeat it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　リターンデーモン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle: Return Demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対応に失敗してリターンで飛ばされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Failed to respond properly and got teleported back by Return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リターンが発動した。うわっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return was activated. Whoa...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気が付くと迷宮の入り口。おのれー　いかって突っ込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I noticed, I was back at the labyrinth's entrance. Damn it—angrily charging in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またリターンデーモンと戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle again with the Return Demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再度、リターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return activated again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷宮の入り口
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The labyrinth entrance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がっくり、やる気を失ったランス、なんか今回はやるきなくなった帰る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, feeling dejected and losing motivation, somehow loses will this time and goes home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランス城に戻っていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And returned to Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞このままクエストアウト　失敗になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Quest out as is – this will be a failure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔迷宮を進んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While progressing through the demon labyrinth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとはバベルの塔から突き落とされて以来
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ever since he was thrown down from the Tower of Babel by Lance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 修行の冒険中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has been on a training adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが過去に冒険で立ち寄った場所を全て制覇する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He aims to conquer all the places Lance ever visited during his past adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてお前を超える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then surpass you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てなのを中二病ぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like a chuunibyou (delusional teen syndrome) phrase.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは面白がってちゃかす、ほう、よく俺様がここを通っていた事を知っていたな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance teases him, amused: 'Oh? You knew well that I used to pass through here.'

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Damn it—angrily charging in."},{"lineNumber":260498,"originalJapaneseLine":"またリターンデーモンと戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle again with the Return Demon."},{"lineNumber":260499,"originalJapaneseLine":"再度、リターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Return activated again."},{"lineNumber":260500,"originalJapaneseLine":"迷宮の入り口","translatedEnglishLine":"The labyrinth entrance."},{"lineNumber":260501,"originalJapaneseLine":"がっくり、やる気を失ったランス、なんか今回はやるきなくなった帰る","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, feeling dejected and losing motivation, somehow loses will this time and goes home."},{"lineNumber":260502,"originalJapaneseLine":"とランス城に戻っていった","translatedEnglishLine":"And returned to Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":260503,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞このままクエストアウト　失敗になります","translatedEnglishLine":"> Quest out as is – this will be a failure."},{"lineNumber":260504,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪魔迷宮を進んでいると","translatedEnglishLine":"While progressing through the demon labyrinth,"},{"lineNumber":260505,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance appears."},{"lineNumber":260506,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスとはバベルの塔から突き落とされて以来","translatedEnglishLine":"Ever since he was thrown down from the Tower of Babel by Lance,"},{"lineNumber":260507,"originalJapaneseLine":"　修行の冒険中","translatedEnglishLine":"He has been on a training adventure."},{"lineNumber":260508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスが過去に冒険で立ち寄った場所を全て制覇する","translatedEnglishLine":"He aims to conquer all the places Lance ever visited during his past adventures."},{"lineNumber":260509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そしてお前を超える","translatedEnglishLine":"And then surpass you."},{"lineNumber":260510,"originalJapaneseLine":"てなのを中二病ぽく","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like a chuunibyou (delusional teen syndrome) phrase."},{"lineNumber":260511,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは面白がってちゃかす、ほう、よく俺様がここを通っていた事を知っていたな","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance teases him, amused: 'Oh? You knew well that I used to pass through here.'"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔人レイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon lord Rei

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さきほどのサテラの説明が的確と分かる感じで見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like showing that Satella's earlier explanation was accurate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦だからしかたないとめんどくさそうに戦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fighting reluctantly, thinking 'It's part of the plan, so it can't be helped'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不良、何か欲求不満でイライラしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The delinquent is irritated, somehow frustrated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５千の魔物兵を連れて戦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is fighting with five thousand demon soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮がめんどくさくなったので自分が出る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tired of the hassle of commanding, he goes out himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと意見を言った魔物兵は電撃で黒焦げ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A demon soldier who voiced an opinion was scorched to a black crisp by an electric shock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傍若無人、あばれまくる、魔人なので圧倒的に強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrogant and rampaging wildly, as a demon lord, he is overwhelmingly strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傭兵団のリーダー、セシルが立ちふさがる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mercenary leader, Cecil, stands in his way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、あんた強そうだな、俺と戦え、逃げるなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, you look strong. Fight me and don't run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは部下に撤退命令を出させ、自分がしんがりとして戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil orders his subordinates to retreat and fights as the rearguard himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中の会話、そういや、この側に悪魔の洞窟があったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During movement, a conversation: 'Come to think of it, there was a demon cave nearby.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこなら魔軍にも接触する事なく近道になるだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That would be a shortcut without encountering the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し移動して悪魔の洞窟に入った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They moved a bit and entered the demon cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かもーん、フェリス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, Felis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼び出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calls her out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か会話・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some conversation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスはこの後消えます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis will disappear after this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔と天使に付け狙われているから、あまり出さないでねと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says she is being targeted by demons and angels, so don't summon her too often.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、悪魔の洞窟を進むぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's proceed through the demon cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔洞窟
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リターンデーモンが道を塞ぐ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A Return Demon blocks the path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ０３と同じ展開、かなみが思い出して・・いやがる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The same scenario as '03', Kanami recalls it... and dislikes it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　かなみを差し出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Offer Kanami.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　リターンデーモンを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Defeat the Return Demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択　かなみを差し出す直後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice: Immediately after offering Kanami.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、またかなみを出そう、前と同じようにエロい事に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll send Kanami out again to do something erotic like last time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使ってくれていいぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feel free to use her for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみが絶望する・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami despairs...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、なーんてな、冗談だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, just kidding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうそうなんども俺様の女を渡してなるものか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no way I’d hand over my woman again and again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時の恨みはらさせてもらうぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll have my revenge for that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択　倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice: Defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時は俺様もまだ若かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then, I was still young.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の俺は人類の王、大総統閣下だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, I am the king of humanity, the supreme commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門番悪魔ごとき敵ではない、ぶっ倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mere gatekeeper demon is no enemy; I'll knock it down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと、門番悪魔ごときって・・あれって６階級悪魔よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, 'mere gatekeeper demon'... that’s a sixth rank demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっこう上位なんだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're pretty high-ranking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、倒せる気がする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine, I feel like I can defeat it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　リターンデーモン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle: Return Demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対応に失敗してリターンで飛ばされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Failed to respond properly and got teleported back by Return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リターンが発動した。うわっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return was activated. Whoa...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気が付くと迷宮の入り口。おのれー　いかって突っ込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I noticed, I was back at the labyrinth's entrance. Damn it—angrily charging in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またリターンデーモンと戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle again with the Return Demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再度、リターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return activated again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迷宮の入り口
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The labyrinth entrance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がっくり、やる気を失ったランス、なんか今回はやるきなくなった帰る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, feeling dejected and losing motivation, somehow loses will this time and goes home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランス城に戻っていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And returned to Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞このままクエストアウト　失敗になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Quest out as is – this will be a failure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔迷宮を進んでいると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While progressing through the demon labyrinth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとはバベルの塔から突き落とされて以来
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ever since he was thrown down from the Tower of Babel by Lance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 修行の冒険中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has been on a training adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが過去に冒険で立ち寄った場所を全て制覇する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He aims to conquer all the places Lance ever visited during his past adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてお前を超える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then surpass you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てなのを中二病ぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like a chuunibyou (delusional teen syndrome) phrase.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは面白がってちゃかす、ほう、よく俺様がここを通っていた事を知っていたな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance teases him, amused: 'Oh? You knew well that I used to pass through here.'
